tree.speaker: Derenisa
tree.text: Why, if it isn't my favorite citizen.

true.speaker: Derenisa
true.text: Lucosa. I have an important question for you.

true.speaker: Derenisa
true.text: I've seen you jump around here, but even with your magic, I find it highly unlikely you were able to get all this way alone. Is there something you aren't telling me?

false.speaker: Derenisa
false.text: Little Ruirui. I have an important question for you.

false.speaker: Derenisa
false.text: There are a lot of large boulders on the road up here. I find it highly unlikely you were able to get all this way alone. Is there something you aren't telling me?

tree.speaker: Rez
tree.text: Oh, uh, no. I did it all myself! Why do you ask?

tree.speaker: Derenisa
tree.text: ...If you're looking to get up the waterfall, this is the way to go. My guards and I think the view is spectacular. I implore you to continue. Citizen.
